statements: DELETE FROM CustomerIdentityInformation WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_info WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM activity_log WHERE log_id = 100 AND customer_id = 10;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE customer_id = 101 AND transaction_amount > 1000
DELETE FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'fraudulent' AND activity_date < '2022-01-01'
